values._instruction: Add an array of measured values.

negativeUncertainties._instruction: Add an array of negative uncertainties for the measured values. Note that it must have the same length as the array of measured values.

positiveUncertainties._instruction: Add an array of positive uncertainties for the measured values. Note that it must have the same length as the array of measured values.

typeOfUncertainty._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used to estimate the negative and positive uncertainties of the measured values.

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement for value array and respective uncertainties.
